de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.dataaccess.query

Interface ISortDefinition<T>


  • public interface ISortDefinition<T>
    Definition of sort criteria inside an IQuery

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISortDefinition<T> addSort(java.lang.String sortField)
      Add a field to sort the resulting selection by.
      ISortDefinition<T> addSort(java.lang.String sortField, boolean ascending)
      Add a field to sort the resulting selection by.
      boolean isEmpty() 
      IQuery<T> parent() 

    • Method Detail

      • parent

        IQuery<T> parent()

      • addSort

        ISortDefinition<T> addSort(java.lang.String sortField)
        Add a field to sort the resulting selection by. This method is the same than addSort( fieldName, true )
        Parameters:
        sortField - the field, by which to sort the selection
        Returns:
        an instance of ISortDefinition for fluent access

      • addSort

        ISortDefinition<T> addSort(java.lang.String sortField,
                           boolean ascending)
        Add a field to sort the resulting selection by. This method is the same than addSort( fieldName, true )
        Parameters:
        sortField - the field, by which to sort the selection
        ascending - true, if sort shall be ascending
        Returns:
        an instance of ISortDefinition for fluent access

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        true if there is no sort definition, otherwise false
